title: Anyone Else Having REALLY Bad Luck With Teams Recently?
body: Got on to play this weekend and it's been nothing but losses, every lane feeds and then my lane (usually bot) we either do bad as well or the fed enemies start roaming, usually it's just a few games but holy crap theres been so many more bad teams and games for me, anyone else notice this?

replies.body:
I just had a guy lock in Varus support. Someone else dodged though, thankfully.

Earlier games, I've had enemy teams cursed with trolls and complete flamers. I've been kinda lucky this weekend but I've had days where I get people that play for 5 minutes and give up or I'll be doing really well and all the other lanes tank. It's really depressing when you're doing well and your team can't even play safe.

though, I went through a small phase of trying new roles and it bit me in the ass. Need to stick with what I know x.x!
